item.title: 政府考虑采取降温措施，首尔房价延续涨势
item.description: 尽管政府采取了一系列旨在冷却需求的措施，但韩国房地产市场仍持续升温，韩国首都的公寓价格已连续第45周上涨。【原文：Prices for apartments in South Korea’s capital extended their rally to a 45th week as the country’s property market stayed heated despite wide-ranging government measures aimed at cooling demand, with more steps in the pipeline.】

item.title: 美联储降息后，铜价升至历史新高
item.description: 在美联储宣布降息并维持明年再降息一次的预期后，铜升至历史新高，其他金属也有所上涨。【原文：Copper rose toward a record high and other metals advanced after the Federal Reserve delivered a widely-expected interest-rate cut and maintained the outlook for one more next year.】

item.title: 中国人工智能独角兽企业MiniMax和浙普据称即将瞄准香港IPO
item.description: 两家被视为 OpenAI 潜在竞争对手的中国人工智能初创公司计划在未来几周内完成在香港的首次公开募股。【原文：Two Chinese artificial-intelligence startups seen as possible rivals to OpenAI aim to complete their Hong Kong initial public offerings in the coming weeks.】

item.title: 溢价飙升，中国白银基金经理发出风险警告
item.description: 中国唯一的纯银基金经理罕见地向投资者发出了一系列警告，如果白银破纪录的涨势结束，投资者将面临 "重大损失 "的风险。【原文：The manager of China’s only pure-play silver fund has issued a rare series of warnings to investors about the risk of “significant losses” should the metal’s record-breaking rally come to an end.】

item.title: 日本 20 年期债券销售迎来 2020 年以来最强劲需求
item.description: 由于较高的收益率水平吸引了投资者，日本 20 年期国债拍卖吸引了自 2020 年以来最强劲的需求。【原文：Japan’s 20-year government bond auction drew its strongest demand since 2020 as higher yield levels attracted investors.】

item.title: 市场回落，VPBank 证券首次交易下跌
item.description: 在越南企业集团 Vingroup 及其相关公司亏损导致大盘下跌的背景下，VPBank 证券股份公司的股票在周四首次上市时下跌。【原文：Shares of VPBank Securities JSC declined in their Thursday debut amid a broader market decline led by losses in Vietnamese conglomerate Vingroup and its related companies.】

item.title: 据说 TPG 考虑出售摩纳哥 APM 珠宝商的股份或进行首次公开募股
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私募股权公司TPG Inc.正在考虑摩纳哥APM珠宝公司的各种选择，包括可能的股权出售或首次公开募股。【原文：Private equity firm TPG Inc. is considering options for APM Monaco, including a possible stake sale or an initial public offering of the jeweler, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行称中国债券收益率可能在 2026 年降至历史最低点
item.description: 法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）称，由于中国政府降息幅度可能超过预期，中国基准债券收益率明年可能跌至历史最低水平。【原文：China’s benchmark bond yields may fall to their lowest-ever level next year as Beijing is likely to cut interest rates more than expected, according to Societe Generale SA.】

item.title: 印度向更广泛的投资开放养老金池，中型和小型股或将得到缓解
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国囤积石油为需求增长放缓前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 预计中国明年将继续大力储备原油，这有助于缓解全球市场过剩膨胀的压力，但同时也掩盖了石油需求增长放缓的大趋势。【原文：China’s robust stockpiling of crude is expected to continue next year, helping to cushion global markets from a swelling surplus, but masking a broader trend of slowing oil demand growth.】

item.title: 印度养老基金反驳监管机构的债券估值建议
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，印度养老金管理公司反驳了行业监管机构旨在保护这个规模达 1750 亿美元的行业免受债券波动影响的建议，称这可能会扭曲基金价值。【原文：Indian pension managers have countered an industry regulator’s proposal aimed at shielding the $175-billion industry from bond volatility, saying it could distort fund values, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 墨西哥批准对中国和其他亚洲国家征收高达 50%的关税
item.description: 墨西哥立法者最终批准对亚洲进口商品征收新关税，与美国收紧对华贸易壁垒的努力大体一致，总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）寻求保护当地工业。【原文：Mexican lawmakers gave final approval for new tariffs on Asian imports, broadly aligning with US efforts to tighten trade barriers against China, as President Claudia Sheinbaum seeks to protect local industry.】

item.title: 分析师称韩国可能在 1,500 点附近加强货币防御
item.description: 据分析师称，如果韩元走软，跌至心理上重要的1,500美元兑1美元的水平，韩国可能会加强对韩元的保护。【原文：South Korea may step up its defense of the won should the currency weaken toward the psychologically important 1,500‑per‑dollar level, a threshold unseen since 2009, according to analysts.】

item.title: 对 Mercuries Life 交易的信心增强，E.Sun 股票上涨
item.description: 太阳金融控股公司（E.Sun Financial Holding Co. ）的股票在因担心该公司计划收购 Mercuries Life Insurance Co.【原文：E.Sun Financial Holding Co.’s stock is rebounding after a selloff driven by worries over its planned takeover of Mercuries Life Insurance Co., signaling that concerns over the deal are fading.】

item.title: 澳大利亚经济意外减少就业，收益率下降
item.description: 澳大利亚经济在 11 月份出人意料地减少了就业岗位，求职人数也有所减少，这表明劳动力市场正在逐步放松，储备银行可能会延长暂停加息的时间。【原文：Australia’s economy unexpectedly shed jobs in November and fewer people sought work, suggesting a gradual loosening in the labor market that may allow the Reserve Bank to extend an interest-rate pause.】

item.title: 瑞穗首席执行官看好日本和美国的交易前景
item.description: 瑞穗金融集团（Mizuho Financial Group Inc.【原文：Mizuho Financial Group Inc.’s chief executive officer expressed optimism that momentum in investment banking will continue both at home and in the US, where Japan’s third-biggest lender has been expanding.】

item.title: 监督机构命令 HESTA 养老金在中断后进行审查
item.description: 澳大利亚金融监管机构已下令养老基金 HESTA 进行独立审查，因为该基金在一次长时间的故障中称其成员受到了损害。【原文：Australia’s financial regulator has ordered pension fund HESTA to conduct independent reviews following a prolonged outage that it said harmed members.】

item.title: 美国指控加拿大男子在 Discord 上以投资者为目标进行诈骗
item.description: 美国检察官指控一名加拿大公民精心策划了一个骗局，在聊天应用程序 Discord Inc.【原文：US prosecutors charged a Canadian citizen with orchestrating a scheme that fraudulently raised more than $42 million, targeting individuals on chat app Discord Inc. while claiming to invest in traditional finance and crypto.】

item.title: 谷歌 DeepMind 将在英国开设机器人人工智能实验室以探索新材料
item.description: 谷歌 DeepMind 将开设首个研究实验室，用于发现新材料，如电池或半导体中使用的材料，这也是谷歌将人工智能应用到更多科学领域的努力的一部分。【原文：Google DeepMind will open its first research lab for discovering new materials, like those used in batteries or semiconductors, as part of its push to apply artificial intelligence to more scientific fields.】

item.title: 投资者称资金流入和套利将重振亚洲新兴市场债券
item.description: 富达国际（Fidelity International）和美国银行（Bank of America Corp）认为，亚洲新兴国家的本币债券有望在 2026 年反弹。【原文：Emerging Asia’s local-currency bonds are poised to rebound in 2026, according to Fidelity International and Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 瑞银称中国小盘股反弹引发对更多 A 股的追捧
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）称，中国小盘股的上涨刺激了全球投资者寻找无法通过香港交易渠道买到的股票。【原文：Gains in Chinese small caps have spurred global investors to seek shares not available via a Hong Kong transaction channel, according to UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 惊人 "产量充斥全球市场，黄油、牛奶和奶酪价格下滑
item.description: 由于全球牛奶产量激增充斥市场，黄油、牛奶和奶酪的价格正在下跌，从而引发了价格疲软期即将到来的警告。【原文：Butter, milk and cheese prices are falling as a surge in global milk production floods the market, prompting warnings of a looming period of weak prices.】

item.title: 沉默的异议 "揭示美联储对鲍威尔削减政策的抵触情绪与日俱增
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔对反对周三再次降息决定的反对票轻描淡写，但会议中一系列更细微的细节揭示了央行已变得多么分裂。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell downplayed dissenting votes against Wednesday’s decision to lower interest rates again, but a slew of finer details from the meeting revealed just how divided the central bank has become.】

item.title: SK海力士股价下跌，大涨引来保证金交易禁令
item.description: SK Hynix Inc. 在纽约上市的预期引发强劲涨势后，韩国主要证券交易所对投资该股发出了更高级别的警告，导致该股下跌。【原文：SK Hynix Inc. fell after South Korea’s main bourse issued a higher-level warning on investing in the stock following strong gains sparked by expectations of a listing in New York.】

item.title: 3.83 亿美元首次公开募股后，JD.com 股价在香港下跌
item.description: 中国电子商务巨头京东（JD.com Inc. ）的供应链部门京东工业公司（Jingdong Industrials Inc.【原文：Shares of Jingdong Industrials Inc., the supply-chain unit of Chinese e-commerce giant JD.com Inc., fell in their Hong Kong trading debut after a HK$2.98 billion ($383 million) initial public offering.】

item.title: 美国扣押委内瑞拉油轮增加风险，石油涨势扩大
item.description: 美国在委内瑞拉沿海扣押了一艘受制裁的油轮，阻止了更多来自这个南美产油国的石油运输，并增加了更大范围冲突的风险，此后石油延续涨势。【原文：Oil extended gains after the US seized a sanctioned tanker off Venezuela, deterring more shipments from the South American producer and raising the risk of a wider conflict.】

item.title: 美联储降息并倾向鸽派，黄金延续涨势
item.description: 在美联储周三宣布降息后，黄金连续第三天上涨，而白银则攀升至历史新高。【原文：Gold rose for a third day after the Federal Reserve delivered a widely expected interest-rate cut on Wednesday, while silver climbed to a record high.】

item.title: 香港 IPO 热潮掩盖了承销商收费率的大幅下降
item.description: 投资银行有望从香港上市承销费中分得多年来最小的一杯羹，尽管该市的股票销售已出现了迅猛反弹。【原文：Investment banks are on track to take home their smallest slice of underwriting fees from Hong Kong listings in years, even as share sales in the city have staged a blistering rebound.】

item.title: 日本推动企业改革，大宗交易创纪录
item.description: 日本股市正在经历一波创纪录的大宗私人交易浪潮，这些交易被称为大宗交易，源于公司为改善公司治理而减少交叉持股。【原文：Japan’s stock market is witnessing a record wave of large private transactions known as block trades, stemming from companies reducing cross-shareholdings to improve corporate governance.】
